description: Grigs are sprites known for lively fiddle music. When playing their fiddles, grigs force any non- sprite within 30 feet of the instrument to succeed on a Will save (DC 15) or be affected as though by Otto’s irresistible danceas long as the playing continues. This is a sonic effect. Anyone capable of playing the instrument (which is of Diminutive size) can produce the effect.

The despair effect lasts 1 round per siren The siren’s class skills (and the key ability for each skill) are class level. Bluff (Cha), Craft (any) (Int), Diplomacy (Cha), Gather Charisma Bonus (Ex): At 3rd level, a siren gains a +2 in- Information (Cha), Intimidate (Cha), Listen (Wis), Perform herent bonus to her Charisma score.
